text: Endrisone (INN) (brand name Aldrisone), or endrysone (USAN), is a synthetic, steroidal glucocorticoid which is or has been marketed in Italy by . It is used as a topical and ophthalmic anti-inflammatory drug in the treatment of skin and eye conditions, respectively. ==See also== * 11β-Hydroxyprogesterone * Medrysone ==References== Category:Cyclohexanols Category:Diketones Category:Glucocorticoids Category:Pregnanes Category:Enones
title: Endrisone
